articles.content:
Filed under:
The HTC Vive Air had a fitness-focused design
Leaked images appeared to show a new fitness-focused VR headset from HTC.

articles.title: Honda sticks with decision to say goodbye to Australian quad bike market - Queensland Country Life
articles.description: Motorcycle giant Honda has confirmed it won't be changing its mind about pulling out of the Australian quad bike market.
articles.content:
Major Japanese quad bike manufacturer Honda has confirmed it won't change its mind on quitting the Australian market on October 10.
